/* 공지사항 리스트 갯수 조회(전체) */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM KB_NTC_INFO WHERE 1=1
AND NTC_TTL LIKE '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%' OR NTC_CN LIKE '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%'
AND NTC_TTL LIKE '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%'
AND NTC_CN LIKE '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%'

/* 공지사항 상세 조회 */ SELECT NOTICE.NTC_SN AS NTC_SN , NOTICE.MNGR_NM AS MNGR_NM , NOTICE.NTC_TTL AS NTC_TTL , REPLACE(NOTICE.NTC_CN, 'kbinnovationhub_devadm', 'kbinnovationhub') AS NTC_CN , NOTICE.ATCH_FILE_SN AS ATCH_FILE_SN , NOTICE.NTC_YN AS NTC_YN , NOTICE.FRST_REG_DT AS FRST_REG_DT , NOTICE.NTC_SN_BEF AS NTC_SN_BEF , NOTICE.NTC_TTL_BEF AS NTC_TTL_BEF , NOTICE.ATCH_FILE_SN_BEF AS ATCH_FILE_SN_BEF , NOTICE.NTC_SN_AFT AS NTC_SN_AFT , NOTICE.NTC_TTL_AFT AS NTC_TTL_AFT , NOTICE.ATCH_FILE_SN_AFT AS ATCH_FILE_SN_AFT , FILES.FILE_SN AS ATCH_FILE_SN , FILES.ORGNL_FILE_NM AS ORIGIN_FILE_NAME , FILES.FILE_NM AS NTC_FILE_NAME , FILES.FILE_PATH AS NTC_PATH FROM ( SELECT NTC.NTC_SN , NTC.NTC_TTL , NTC.ATCH_FILE_SN , NTC.NTC_CN , NTC.NTC_YN , NTC.FRST_REG_DT , NTC.MNGR_NM , NTC.SORT_NO , LAG(NTC.NTC_SN, 1) OVER(ORDER BY NTC.SORT_NO) AS NTC_SN_BEF , LAG(NTC.NTC_TTL, 1) OVER(ORDER BY NTC.SORT_NO) AS NTC_TTL_BEF , LAG(NTC.ATCH_FILE_SN, 1) OVER(ORDER BY NTC.SORT_NO) AS ATCH_FILE_SN_BEF , LEAD(NTC.NTC_SN, 1) OVER(ORDER BY NTC.SORT_NO) AS NTC_SN_AFT , LEAD(NTC.NTC_TTL, 1) OVER(ORDER BY NTC.SORT_NO) AS NTC_TTL_AFT , LEAD(NTC.ATCH_FILE_SN, 1) OVER(ORDER BY NTC.SORT_NO) AS ATCH_FILE_SN_AFT FROM ( SELECT NTC1.* FROM ( SELECT NTC.NTC_SN AS NTC_SN , NTC.SORT_NO AS SORT_NO , NTC.NTC_TTL AS NTC_TTL , MEM.MNGR_NM , NTC.NTC_CN AS NTC_CN , TO_CHAR(NTC.FRST_REG_DT, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS FRST_REG_DT , NTC.FRST_RGTR AS FRST_RGTR , NTC.NTC_YN AS NTC_YN , FILES.FILE_SN AS ATCH_FILE_SN , FILES.ORGNL_FILE_NM AS ORIGIN_FILE_NAME , FILES.FILE_NM AS NTC_FILE_NAME , FILES.FILE_PATH AS NTC_PATH FROM KB_NTC_INFO NTC , KB_FILE_INFO FILES , KB_MNGR_MBR_INFO MEM WHERE NTC.NTC_YN = 'Y' AND MEM.MNGR_SN = NTC.FRST_RGTR AND NTC.EXPSR_YN = 'Y' AND NTC.ATCH_FILE_SN = FILES.FILE_SN(+) ORDER BY NTC.SORT_NO, NTC.NTC_SN DESC ) NTC1 UNION ALL SELECT NTC2.* FROM ( SELECT NTC.NTC_SN AS NTC_SN , NTC.SORT_NO AS SORT_NO , NTC.NTC_TTL AS NTC_TTL , MEM.MNGR_NM , NTC.NTC_CN AS NTC_CN , TO_CHAR(NTC.FRST_REG_DT, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS FRST_REG_DT , NTC.FRST_RGTR AS FRST_RGTR , NTC.NTC_YN AS NTC_YN , FILES.FILE_SN AS ATCH_FILE_SN , FILES.ORGNL_FILE_NM AS ORIGIN_FILE_NAME , FILES.FILE_NM AS NTC_FILE_NAME , FILES.FILE_PATH AS NTC_PATH FROM KB_NTC_INFO NTC , KB_FILE_INFO FILES , KB_MNGR_MBR_INFO MEM WHERE NTC_YN = 'N' AND NTC.EXPSR_YN = 'Y' AND MEM.MNGR_SN = NTC.FRST_RGTR AND NTC.ATCH_FILE_SN = FILES.FILE_SN(+) ORDER BY NTC.SORT_NO, NTC.NTC_SN DESC ) NTC2 ) NTC ) NOTICE , KB_FILE_INFO FILES WHERE NOTICE.ATCH_FILE_SN = FILES.FILE_SN(+) AND NOTICE.NTC_SN = #{ntc_sn}
